name: Robert Masella
bio: Rob Masella has been a gameplay engineer at Rare for 12 years, working on titles like Banjo Kazooie: Nuts and Bolts, Kinect Sports and Sea of Thieves. In this time, he's been involved in many feature areas such as physics, character control and animation. In the last couple of years, he's been focusing on AI, bringing enemies to life in Sea of Thieves.
